DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of the study is to evaluate the amount of compound present in the blood (pharmacokinetics) after single and of multiple doses of GLPG0634 in elderly healthy subjects. During the course of the study, the effect of aging on the pharmacokinetics as well as the effects of GLPG0634 on mechanism of action-related parameters in the blood (pharmacodynamics) will be assessed and the safety of multiple oral doses of GLPG0634 in elderly healthy subjects will be characterized.
DOC.brief_title: Single and Multiple Dose Pharmacokinetics of GLPG0634 in Elderly Healthy Subjects
DOC.criteria: Healthy male or female, age 40 years and older BMI between 1830 kg/m2 Any condition that might interfere with the procedures or tests in this study Drug or alcohol abuse Smoking
